aboutpara: Hello there! I am Sanidhya Shukla. A student of SRM Institute of Science and Technology. I like reading mytho-fiction in my free time and playing Valorant. I aspire to be a data scientist as well as have a good grip at Web Development. I have only recently started working on projects. I hope to not repeat the mistakes I have made in the past and make amends. Follow my socials!
